title: Bound But Unshackled
description: A vocational therapist meets strong resistance from the most unlikely source, when attempting to assist a severely disabled student to reach his full potential.  Will Jennifer be able to prove to his dad, that Craig is not an imbecilic “Veggie”, as his father believes, but a real live, lonely little boy, trapped inside his recalcitrant Cerebral Palsy body?
author: Elizabeth Ann Kirby
